name: Tactical Heroes 2: Platoons
description:
TRAIN massive armies, produce iconic helicopters, go to war with thousands of REAL players, form powerful alliances and develop your own military strategies.

FEATURES
- Build Hueys and tanks
- Develop your town & research new technologies
- Choose your faction and fight for domination
- Explore and have fun with the World Map in AR
- Forge Alliances with other commanders
- Defeat enemy players in an army game
- Chat in real time with your friends
- Join troops with allied commanders
- Conquer the Independence Palace
- Fight for the President title
- Assign military roles to your friends & foes
- Reach the top of the rankings
- Compete with thousands of players in events
- Level Up your Commander
- Complete Missions to collect rewards
- Use FREE Speed Ups to develop faster
- Gather resources, scout enemy players or defeat rebellious armies
- Become a VIP player and gain game-changing bonuses
- Use brute force, subterfuge or diplomacy to win the war: in the end, it's all a matter of choice
- Discover countless of strategic and diplomatic choices!

Join a world of war and test yourself against real players worldwide! PLAY NOW!
